requirements: Build a creative Gomoku (五子棋) web game with AI opponent, progressive campaign, and a landing page website

tasks.description: Project scaffolding + Canvas game board: Create HTML/CSS/JS project structure, render a 15x15 board on HTML Canvas, handle click-to-place stones with visual feedback, responsive layout
Core game engine: Game state management, alternating turns (black/white), 5-in-a-row win detection (horizontal/vertical/diagonal), undo move, draw detection, game reset
AI opponent with 4 difficulty levels: Implement minimax with alpha-beta pruning, move evaluation heuristics (threat detection, pattern scoring), Easy/Medium/Hard/Master levels, AI thinking indicator

Creative campaign mode: 10-level progressive campaign with increasing AI difficulty, power stones (Bomb: remove opponent stone, Shield: protect a cell, Double: place 2 stones), board obstacles that block cells, score system with stars rating per level

UI/UX polish: Stone placement animations, last-move highlight, win-line animation, dark/light theme toggle, move history sidebar, per-move timer, sound effects (place/capture/win), fully responsive mobile layout

Landing page website: Hero section with animated game preview, feature highlights with icons, How to Play section, embedded playable demo, responsive design, modern CSS with gradients and glass-morphism
Complete documentation: README.md with screenshots placeholder, game rules and creative mechanics explanation, AI difficulty breakdown, project structure docs, LICENSE file
